column2: "Na mbrato a ɔato no mu biara wɔrennkaa nntsia no: ne ndzeyɛtsenenee a ɔayɛ no no mu na ɔbɛtsena ase."

mubobu hom atsɛn
column6: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse. Hom nsan

column2: "Hom ntow hom mbratodze a hom dze ato mbra no nyina mfi hom ho ngu; na hom nya akoma fofor na sunsum fofor mma homho: na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom bowu
"Na minnyi nyia owu no wu ho enyigye
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse: dɛm ntsi hom nsakyer
column4: na hom nnya nkwa."
